text: motor vehicles rules of the road highway markings amend rsa i d to read as follows d in order to pass a pedestrian a motorized wheelchair a mobility scooter or device or a device moved by human power including a bicycle skateboard or provided such movement can be made safely or new subparagraph motor vehicles rules of the road highway markings amend rsa i by inserting after subparagraph d the following new subparagraph e in order to comply with rsa
